paper.title: The COMANDOS integration system: an object oriented approach to the interconnection of heterogeneous applications

author.org: Dipartimento di Elettronica, Politecnico di Milano, Italia

paper.venue: Lecture notes in computer science on Advances in object-oriented database systems
paper.abstract: This paper describes an approach to the integration of heterogeneous data management applications. The proposed approach is based on techniques derived from the fields of Object Oriented Databases and Object Oriented Programming Languages. The architecture of a system which implements this approach is also briefly described.
